item.description:
One of our newest members, Diane, will be hosting a Potluck Brunch for our Meetup Group on April 17th at 11:30 a.m. at her home is Smithfield. The idea for a Brunch was suggested by a few of our members so we are excited to have this new event scheduled. You can prepare something ahead of time or just bring the ingredients and cook there.

Please remember that we try to keep all dishes Vegan. Our Potlucks are always a great success so if you havenâ€™t had an opportunity to attend one yet we look forward to seeing you on April 17th! Please remember to RSVP and feel free to bring a friend or two.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Potluck Brunch
